dishes.name: Sake Premium
dishes.fullDescription: Premium junmai sake from Niigata prefecture, served chilled. Clean, crisp flavor with subtle fruity notes and a smooth finish.

dishes.name: Green Tea
dishes.fullDescription: High-quality sencha green tea from Shizuoka prefecture. Light, refreshing taste with grassy notes and natural sweetness.

dishes.name: Ramune
dishes.fullDescription: Traditional Japanese carbonated soft drink with a unique marble seal. Available in original, strawberry, or melon flavors.

dishes.name: Edamame
dishes.shortDescription: Steamed young soybeans with sea salt
dishes.fullDescription: Fresh edamame beans steamed to perfection and lightly salted with coarse sea salt. A healthy and traditional Japanese appetizer.

dishes.name: Gyoza
dishes.fullDescription: Six handmade dumplings filled with seasoned ground pork and vegetables, pan-fried until golden and served with ponzu dipping sauce.

dishes.name: Miso Soup
dishes.fullDescription: Classic miso soup made with red miso paste, tofu cubes, wakame seaweed, and green onions. Served hot in a traditional bowl.

dishes.name: Agedashi Tofu
dishes.shortDescription: Lightly fried tofu in savory broth
dishes.fullDescription: Soft tofu lightly dusted and fried, served in a warm dashi broth with grated daikon, ginger, and bonito flakes.

dishes.name: Salmon Sashimi
dishes.fullDescription: Premium Atlantic salmon, expertly sliced and served with wasabi, pickled ginger, and soy sauce. Five pieces per order.

dishes.name: Chirashi Bowl
dishes.fullDescription: Fresh assorted sashimi including tuna, salmon, yellowtail, and shrimp served over seasoned sushi rice with tamago and cucumber.

dishes.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
dishes.fullDescription: Creamy tonkotsu broth simmered for 20 hours, served with fresh ramen noodles, chashu pork, soft-boiled egg, and green onions.

dishes.name: Dragon Roll
dishes.fullDescription: Inside-out roll with shrimp tempura and cucumber, topped with grilled eel, avocado, and sweet eel sauce. Eight pieces.

dishes.name: Chicken Teriyaki
dishes.fullDescription: Tender chicken thigh grilled to perfection and glazed with house-made teriyaki sauce. Served with steamed rice and vegetables.

dishes.name: Mochi Ice Cream
dishes.shortDescription: Sweet rice cake with ice cream
dishes.fullDescription: Traditional mochi wrapped around premium ice cream. Choice of vanilla, green tea, red bean, or mango flavors. Three pieces.

dishes.name: Dorayaki
dishes.fullDescription: Two fluffy pancakes filled with sweet red bean paste (anko). A beloved Japanese confection, served with a dusting of powdered sugar.
